text: Daniel Calparsoro (born 11 May 1968) is a Spanish film director. ==Biography== He was the husband of the Money Heist star Najwa Nimri. ==Selected filmography== * Blinded (1997) * Asfalto (2000) * Guerreros (2002) * Combustion (2013) * Cien años de perdón (2016) * The Warning (2018) * Twin Murders: The Silence of the White City (2019) == References == == External links == * Category:Spanish film directors Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Daniel Calparsoro
